Uses of Package
imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear

  • Packages that use imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.homography
    This package contains experimental code for homography estimation.
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear  
    imagingbook.pub.lucaskanade  
    imagingbook.pub.lucaskanade.utils  
  • Classes in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear used by imagingbook.pub.geometry.homography 
    Class Description
    ProjectiveMapping2D
    This class represents a projective transformation in 2D (also known as a "homography").
  • Classes in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear used by imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear 
    Class Description
    AffineMapping2D
    This class represents an affine transformation in 2D, which can be defined by three pairs of corresponding points.
    LinearMapping2D
    This class represents an arbitrary linear transformation in 2D.
    ProjectiveMapping2D
    This class represents a projective transformation in 2D (also known as a "homography").
    Rotation2D
    This class represents a pure 2D rotation about the coordinate origin (as a special case of affine mapping).
    Scaling2D
    This class represents a 2D scaling transformation (as a special case of affine transformation).
    Shear2D
    This class represents a 2D shear transformation (as a special case of affine transformation).
    Translation2D
    This class represents a pure 2D translation (as a special case of affine transformation).
  • Classes in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear used by imagingbook.pub.lucaskanade 
    Class Description
    AffineMapping2D
    This class represents an affine transformation in 2D, which can be defined by three pairs of corresponding points.
    ProjectiveMapping2D
    This class represents a projective transformation in 2D (also known as a "homography").
    Translation2D
    This class represents a pure 2D translation (as a special case of affine transformation).
  • Classes in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear used by imagingbook.pub.lucaskanade.utils 
    Class Description
    LinearMapping2D
    This class represents an arbitrary linear transformation in 2D.
